duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist the supervisor with the inventory, accountability, storage and safeguard of warehouse merchandise.
Count all warehouse inventory and supplies on a periodic basis.
Maintain computerized and manual files for tracking inventory.
Report all discrepancies to the inventory manager.
Operate electronic and other equipment needed to carry out job functions and responsibilities.
Locate and remove expired or defective merchandise from the inventory.
Use computerized inventory software to record, track, and maintain all inventory related data.
Assist in the organization of the warehouse.
Process daily, weekly, and monthly reports of inventory statistics.
Be flexible to work beyond normal work hours and workweek.
Perform any duties and responsibilities that are within the scope of employment as assigned by the supervisor.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or High School Equivalency Diploma
